backround.description: For use as a background color, in components such as Page

default.description: Used for links, plain buttons, and as the fill color for selected checkboxes and radio buttons.

primary.description: Used as the background color for primary actions, and as the fill color for icons and the text color in navigation and tabs to communicate interaction states.

onPrimary.description: For use as a text color on primary actions. Not for use in text on navigation and tabs.
For use as a fill color for icons on primary actions. Not for use in icons on navigation and tabs.
